original_title: David Ortiz: Legend of the Fall
overview: Big Papi was at his best when it mattered, heralded as the greatest playoff clutch hitter of all-time. Filmed over the course of just six weeks, David Ortiz: Legend Of The Fall documents the three time world champion's recent induction in the baseball Hall of Fame â€“ capturing the lead-up to this momentous event, the actual ceremony and the afterglow of his enshrinement.
title: David Ortiz: Legend of the Fall
